metadata.title: USN-4662-1 -- OpenSSL vulnerability
metadata.description: David Benjamin discovered that OpenSSL incorrectly handled comparing certificates containing a EDIPartyName name type. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause OpenSSL to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4662-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libssl1.0.0 - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu4.18 libssl-dev - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu4.18 openssl - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu4.18 libssl-doc - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu4.18 libcrypto1.0.0-udeb - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu4.18 libssl1.0.0-udeb - 1.0.2g-1ubuntu4.18 No subscription required
